req_packet

Simple transaction class with various sizes of bit and logic vectors.

Contents
req_packetSimple transaction class with various sizes of bit and logic vectors.
consumer_with_transport_portComponent to receive packet on the put port (sv_out) and send it back on the analysis port (sv_in).

consumer_with_transport_port

Component to receive packet on the put port (sv_out) and send it back on the analysis port (sv_in).  Idea here is to check that after packing and unpacking we do not loose any information.

Summary
